1111.content:
Pearl was at Wright and Co. Law Offices. She was striving to become a great Spirit Medium like her Cousin and Aunt, so she wanted to practice as much as she could.

She couldn't think of what to summon though, so she was wandering around the room for what seemed like hours. She finally got an idea when she saw a dead bug on the floor and decided to try something that had never been done before: Summoning dead insects! She had focused herself and managed to summon the dead bug's spirit, blacking out for a moment.

When she awoke she looked around and saw she was somehow the size of the bug. "Hmm, that's funny..." She thought. "Is the summoning still happening with me in control...?"

She began to think of a way to get back to normal when her cousin entered the room. Maya entered holding a brown paper bag and licking her fingers. "Hey, Pearly! I saved you a burger!" She looked around for her. "I'm here, Mystic Maya!" Pearl called from the couch, but to no avail as Maya didn't notice.

"Hmm, seems like she's out. I guess, I can save this for her." She placed the bag on the arms of the couch. Then after she did this, Pearl looked on in shock as her cousin's now gigantic ass was coming straight for her, about to crush her. Pearl seeing her cousin's butt getting closer felt...

It's probably me feel in things." She thought as she went to eat her burger.

While the giant girl was eating her burger, Pearl was trying her best to move out of her cousin's ads but couldn't move even one centimeter, that's when she felt Maya's butt rumbling. "Oh no, please don't tell me!" Pearl thought as a sudden point-blank *PPPFFRRT* hit Pearl's nostrils. Her big cousin, Maya Feym just farted on her without knowing and poor Pearl had her eyes water from the giantess's stink. "Whew, had to let that one loose. It's a good thing that Pearl wasn't here to smell that!" Maya said, not realizing how wrong she is.

111321212.content:
"How cute! You thought that you could escape so easily, that won't be tolerated! I was going to give you some lemonade for you to drink and everything." Maya knew that the 'lemonade' was her pee, but Pearl doesn't need to know that yet.
         "Mystic Maya! I'm so sorry! I was just scared of what you were going to do!"
         "No excuses Pearly! I'm hurt that you would try to run away from your only cousin! I guess you need to learn to appreciate me better." Maya says faking anger. "Open wide Pearly, you might not like it now, but you'll enjoy the taste of my excrements soon enough!"
         A log of shit emerged from Maya's anus and descended slowly towards Pearl's mouth. Pearl closed her mouth in protest to prevent the foul thing from entering her mouth, but it forced itself through. Pearl gagged and coughed but in the end she was able to swallow it all.
         "Please Mystic Maya! Please can I have some lemonade now? I'm sorry for trying to leave!" Pearl begged.
         "Sure thing Pearly!" She hands Pearl the glass.
         Pearl drinks the pee lemonade, not realizing that that it what it actually was. She thought that it was warm because it was out for so long, and she didn't notice the taste too much due to the fact that the taste of shit still lingered within. "Wow Mystic Maya, thank you for the lemonade! It tasted really good."
         Maya did not expect that reaction, but felt it was a welcome one. If she doesn't realize that that's my pee and thinks it tastes good, then I can use this as a reward to get her to do demeaning tasks and then demean her further with her reward Maya thought to herself. "Well Pearly if you like it so much, I'll go make a whole pitcher of lemonade for you, as long as you do what I tell you to do." Does Pearly agree.

14.content:
Welcome to the Alternate Modes section! In this section, you can choose different modes that make female character(s) of Ace Attorney suffer to the horrible smells of gas! Right now we have a limited amount of options, but you can contribute by emailing me some more ideas!
These are the modes available:
Gang-Fart: A group of characters torture a female character.
Trap Room: A group of female characters get trapped in a small space while at least one of them farts uncontrollably.
Trap Room - Male: The same, but with one male character, and he must be the farter.
Crossover: A character from a different game/anime/manga/etc. comes to the Ace Attorney world and farts on one of the characters.
What will your choice be?
14.title: Alternate Modes

141.content:
The rules for this mode is simple. You choose a character to be tortured, and then you choose the characters who will fart.
Who will be the victim?
141.title: Gang-Fart

142.content:
For this mode, you have to choose at least 3 female characters, and then choose the start option after the 3rd character, or choose more.
But first, who will be the farter?
142.title: Trap Room

1421.content: OK. Now, who will be the 1st girl?
1421.title: Maya Fey

choices: Take up Maya's offer for a fartoff
Suffer a loss of oxygen worthy of DL-6
1421122.content:
Maya had a devilish look on her face as she prepared a terrible scheme. She had invited Franziska and Adrian Andrews to spend their 15 minute recess going to the upper floor of the court. This was a case about a burglary, so Maya felt it was immoral for a...*ahem* "delay. They all got in the elevator.

"This better be good, Maya Fey. I have some important work to do to crush that friend of yours after break." Franziska said.

"Oh don't worry," Maya replied, "this won't be TOO long."

Just then Maya used her Magatama to channel some kind of spell to stop the elevator.

"Um....did you do that just now?" Adrian was afraid to ask.

"Nope. That seems to be an issue with the elevator. Ohhhh, my stomach..." just then Maya lifted her leg at Franny....

PFFFFFFFFFT!!!!! Maya ripped a terrible fart leaving the prodigy in shock.

"MAYA FEY, IF I HAD MY WHIP RIGHT NOW YOU WOULD PAY FOR THAT!"

"Ha! Tell you what, you can leave if either of you beats me in a farting contest."

"...Well Ms. Karma?" Adrian said. "Shall we? I had something spicy before this..."

"ABSOLUTELY not! I am perfect, I do not break wind!" She was fanning the air still from Maya's rear blast. "You will have to."

Just then, Maya broke loose with a barrage of blasts from her butt trumpet. "Better decide soooon~!"

"Oh goodness!" Adrian couldn't stand it. "Well...."

What should Adrian do?
1421122.title: No

14511.content:
Wendy Oldbag has been in love with Miles Edgeworth for a long time. She would follow him anywhere if given the chance. In his past two cases, she had noticed that many girls have been following him all around. Oldbag thought that they also wanted Edgeworth's heart, so she needed to get rid of them as soon as possible. Lately Oldbag has had lots of gas because ofsomething she ate, maybe all those prunes, so she had planned a way to get rid of all of them. Her first target would be Kay Faraday, the one that was always with him.

15421.content:
The young woman stumbled as she was shoved into the guard station, falling over and landing next to Wendy's chair. The old security officer quickly seized the moment and grabbed Maya by her hair, dragging her up a little until her head was laid on the seat. The speed and ferocity of the old guard had surprised Maya and she was too dazed to do a thing whilst Wendy turned around and presented her tightly clad ass, leaning back to take a seat right on the girl's head.

"Aaaaah, there we go. Bet you didn't expect that, did you? Back in my day, being security meant keeping things proper secure. No wailing fangirls and the like ever got past me, and you won't be any different. Now prepare to taste this chili after I'm done with it."

Almost on command the old woman farted loudly, providing a lengthy chain of gagging and coughing from her seat. Wendy kept her rear firmly down and continued to gas her victim. With each stinky burst Maya's struggles faded. The old guard laughed haughtily as she subdued this intruder in an ever so satisfying way. She didn't get to indulge in this very often, but this trespasser was right just at the right moment. Without a care in the world she filled the guard station with her noxious fumes.

Maya's nose ached from the horrid smell and her face stung from the denim of Wendy's parts harshly pressing down. She tried to fight but her muscles were reluctant to act. The rancid gas made her feel leaden as she needed her willpower just to stay conscious. To say her plan failed would be an understatement. She hadn't expected security to be this tight, and certainly not this smelly. But the old guard wasn't done with her victim yet. What does she do next to 'neutralize' this intruder?

154211.content:
"Ow, I know, I'm going too easy on you. Back in my day we would really give it to you. Several guards in a row, chili dinners all around. I guess little old me will just have to try extra hard."

Wendy stood up, looking behind her to see Maya's barely conscious body draped onto the chair. Her face looked a little dirty and her eyes were glazed over. This thousand-yard stare didn't even flinch when the security guard dropped her pants to her ankles and sat right back down again, pressing Maya's face into the leathery skin. The young woman had no energy left to struggle. The stench seared her nostrils with its intensity and the smothering mass had cut off all of her air supply. Slowly everything around her began to go numb. Wendy's rambling turned to incongruous noise and the sight of her ass went blurry. Even the stench seemed to get duller with the second until Maya finally passed out.

When Wendy felt the intruder go limp she unleashed one final noisy fart before standing up and pulling her pants back up. She popped open the door to the guard station to air out the worst of the stench and called the police. It took a while for them to arrive, during which the old guard repeatedly sat back down again on her target to make sure she stayed knocked out by way of another serving of vile gas.

Finally the cops showed up and Wendy handed the intruder over to them. The last she saw of Maya was her unconscious ass being hauled into the back of the cop car. She told the officers everything they needed to know and encouraged them to use similar tactics when 'interrogating' the woman. With a job well done Wendy returns to her post to keep an eye out for other intruders that needed to learn the errors of their ways the hard way.

The young woman's struggles had nearly fallen silent, but the security guard was still stuck with her. She had to patrol the area to keep everything safe, but she couldn't do that with Maya still in the guard station. The old woman lets out one last fart to ensure her target wouldn't get up before rummaging through the cabinet in the guard station. She retrieves a small pistol from a locked container. It looks strange and futuristic and after adjusting the dials on the side she points it at Maya and pulls the trigger. A short beam of strange energy strikes the dazed woman, engulfing her in a yellowish glow for a few seconds.

Maya feels her whole body ache for an instant before she feels enveloped by an eerie chill. The world around her grows as she feels herself shrink. She stumbles to stop herself from falling on the floor of the guard station and after a while she looks up to the towering old woman standing before her. She wasn't even tall enough to reach up to Wendy's knees. The old guard had already put the shrink ray back into its locker, now looming over her victim.

"There we go, now you're a lot more manageable. Back in my day we'd have more guards so I could take my time with this, but I suppose this will work." She says, gloating over Maya's misfortune. The young woman tries to stagger back, but Wendy has no problem picking her up. With her victim in hand the old guard laughs out loud. She reaches back and pulls open the rear of her pants, dangling Maya over it. She drops her in and snaps the waistband back, trapping her victim between her panties and the harsh denim of her pants.

155332121.content:
I was just on my late night patrol, when I suddenly heard the sound of metal crashing. "Who's there!? Is somebody there?" I immediately shouted out. No answer. Figures. "It's probably nothing, but..." I think out loud. I took out my baton, and went to the source of the sound, the cargo room. As I opened the door, I saw a silhouette of 2 people. She dropped the pipe and slowly turned to me. "I'm sorry, I didn't mean to-" "We don't treat intruders well on our ship!" I shone the flashlight to the other person. I couldn't see her face, but from her outfit I knew it was the cook, Olivia Aldente. Seeing her reminded me; grooowlll... "Ugh!" Makes me wonder why the heck she'd snoop around on the ship anyway. But, trespassers are trespassers. I should actually turn her into the police, but not before I punish her expertly.
I put away my baton and approached the girl, smiling as I took each step. She looked like she was so scared she'd piss her pants right now. "You should feel honored. info.description:
This interactive is for Ace Attorney (the game series) characters farting on the girls.
-RULES-
I prefer:
Toilet Torture
Fartee shrink
Anal Vore (if the fartee shrinks)
More than 1 person farting on the same girl(s)
I allow:
Body Swap/Revenge/etc. (Female on Female only)
More than 1 girl being farted on
Other smelly tortures (feet, armpits, etc.)
I don't allow:
Death
Farting on Male
Gay
Sex
-TIMELINES-
There is a total of 3 timelines. When choosing a character that appears in more than 1 game that are in different timelines, a chapter that lets you choose which timeline will appear before choosing the victim that is in the same timeline.
1.Pre-PW/Turnabout Reminiscence: The characters that appeared in Turnabout Reminiscence, Turnabout Memories and Turnabout Beginnings
2.PW/AAI: The characters that appeared in any of the Phoenix Wright: Ace Attorney games and/or Ace Attorney Investigations: Miles Edgeworth, the MASON system in Turnabout Succession, and Professor Layton vs Phoenix Wright.
3.AJ/PW:DD: The characters that appeared in Apollo Justice: Ace Attorney and/or Phoenix Wright: Ace Attorney: Dual Destinies
